name: ChopChop
description: Chop Chop Chinese Home Delivery is one of the oldest and most respected home delivery businesses in Brisbane specialising in delivering freshly cooked Chinese, Noodles and Sushi meals.  ChopChop boasts one of the best equipped kitchens in town and can cater to every occasion
disclaimer: *10% Surcharge applies on Sundays. 15% surcharge applies on Public Holidays. 5% surcharge applies after 10pm in Brisbane andsurrounding suburbs. $2 surcharge applies for each additional topping & half ‘n’ half pizzas. $2.95 surcharge applies for "Cheesy Crust", "The Edge", "Gluten Free" Pizzas. No half ‘n’ half or substitute toppings allowed on the Value Range. Premium Pizzas $2.95 more than Traditional Range. **Pepperoni is made from pork and beef blend. Minimum order amount for delivery $22. Prices for delivery higher than pick-up and varies by store. Drivers only carry $20 in change. All offers not valid with any other coupon or offer. Only available at selected stores. Prices include GST. DOMINO’S, the Tile Device, the slogan PEOPLE, POWERED, PIZZA are trademarks or registered trademarks of Domino’s IP Holder LLC in Australia. kJ information based on Pizza made on Classic Crust. The average adult daily energy intake is 8700kJ
